ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] new guild forming
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldn t mind getting my main character into an Uber guild on Quelious !! If you know things like web design and have the time and effort to put into it
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldn't mind getting my main character into an Uber guild on "Quelious"!! If you know things like web design and have the time and effort to put into it guilds are easy to run. The only hard part is when guildies fight with each other which happens in higher end guilds. BeverlyAKA Alexandrah

PsyKo <sibilant_ghost@...> wrote:it must be a great guild indeed if one must tempt
newbies to join with petty plat =p ... JK .. guild
forming is harder than it looks so, good luck and stay
away from poisoned kool-aid
